name: Url

types.name: Part
types.comment: A parameterized part (segment or query value) of a URL.

types.name: Url
types.comment:
A URL parameterized over the type `a`, which is typically a record containing
a field for each parameterized `Part`.

values.type: Url.Url a -> Url.Part a -> Url.Url a
Url.Url a -> ( String, Url.Part a ) -> Url.Url a

values.name: append
values.comment: Append a segment to the URL.
values.type: Url.Part a -> Url.Url a -> Url.Url a

values.name: appendParam
values.comment:
Append a query parameter to the URL.

    root
        |> append (s "part")
        |> appendParam "show" (bool .show)
        |> Url.toString { show = True }
        --> "/part?show=true"
values.type: String -> Url.Part a -> Url.Url a -> Url.Url a

values.name: bool
values.comment:
A parameterized boolean part.

    root
        |> append (bool .show)
        |> Url.toString { show = True }
        --> "/true"

values.name: custom
int
values.comment:
A parameterized (variable) integer part.

    root
        |> append (s "users")
        |> append (int .id)
        |> Url.toString { id = 42 }
        --> "/users/42"

values.name: s
values.comment:
An unparameterized (static) part.

    root |> append (s "users") |> Url.toString () --> "/users"

values.name: string
values.comment:
A parameterized string part.

    root
        |> append (s "say")
        |> append (string .word)
        |> Url.toString { word = "Hello" }
        --> "/say/Hello"

values.name: toString
values.comment: Give a string representation of the URL, given a value for the parameter.
